Santa_Clara.Pathway Bible Fellowship:
Pathway Bible Church (formerly Pathway Bible Fellowship), or Pathway, is a ministry of New Vision Church, located in Milpitas, California. The congregation was founded in 1992 in San José, California.


== History ==
The church was formed in 1992 by the Korean First Baptist Church of San Jose (currently New Vision Church) to serve the growing number of English-speaking Korean adults in the San José area at the time.
